title: 67 The Fate of On-Demand Delivery
description: Paul Barron sits down with Jon Sewell, the chief executive officer of Motus and owner of restaurant chain D.P. Dough. Sewell helped form the cooperative delivery service CHOMP in Iowa City with fellow restaurant owners and industry leaders, and has since expanded the service to other cities through his company Motus.
